cause.description:
Whether its just boycotting fur, understanding animal rights movements, eating organic, that is a start, and help.
For vegetarians, vegans, anti-fur, animal lovers, ect.
Support the cause. And understand it more.
<object width="425" height="350"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/oZ_i4qDRzzg"></param><param name="wmode" value="transparent"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/oZ_i4qDRzzg" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" width="425" height="350"></embed></object>
1. Animals in slaughter houses not treated humane
2. Most un-organic meat comes from UNKNOWN sources
3. Fur is not for fashion
4. A "pet" is a family member, not an accessory
cause.name: People for Ethical Treatment of Animals (PETA)
